Title: October 2022
Content: *p71863a02232*22   *(d)sodium ethanoate, ch3coona, reacts with 2-methylpropanoyl chloride, (ch3)2chcocl, to form organic compound z and sodium chloride, nacl.the molecular ion peak in the mass spectrum of z is at m/z = 130.the infrared spectrum of z has peaks at 1820cm1 and 1754cm1.the carbon-13 nmr spectrum of z has five peaks.a simplified high resolution proton nmr spectrum of z is shown. the number of protons in each environment is indicated on the spectrum.3.00.00.51.01.52.02.51h3h6h / ppmdeduce the structure of z, showing how your answer is consistent with all the information provided.(6)
